resources.string: Players are divided into two types: Spies and Civilians.Only civilians know the location and they must find the Spy. The Spy must guess the location
All players ask questions in turn. You can ask questions to any player.
Listen and memorize questions and answers from other players
Any player may name the Spy. After that, all players vote whether the player is the Spy

With the consent of all players, the selected player voices his role. If he turns out to be a Civilian, the Spy wins. If the Spy has guessed the location, he can name it. If the Spy guessed right, he wins, otherwise, he loses
Be mindful of the time. It is limited and plays into the hands of the spy. At the end of the timer, the Spy wins.

The spy: try to guess the round\'s location. Infer from others\' questions and answers.
Other players: figure out who the spy is.

Round length: 6-10 minutes. Shorter for smaller groups, longer for larger.
The location: round starts, each player is given a location card. The location is the same for all players (e.g., the bank) except for one player, who is randomly given the "spy" card. The spy does not know the round\'s location.

Questioning: the game leader begins by questioning another player about the location.
Answering: the questioned player must answer. No follow up questions allowed. After they answer, it\'s then their turn to ask someone else a question. This continues until round is over.

Putting up for vote: at any time, a player can try to indict a suspected spy by putting that suspect up for vote. Then go one by one clockwise around the circle, and each player much cast their vote if they\'re in agreement to indict.
Spy is indicted: if a player is indicted, they must reveal whether or not they are the spy and the round ends.
Spy guesses: at any time, the spy can reveal that they are the spy and make a guess at what the location is. The round immediately ends.

Indictment: group successfully indicts a player after voting
OR
Spy guesses: spy stops the round to make a guess about the location
OR
No time left: clock runs out

Spy Victory
The spy earns 2 points if no one is successfully indicted of being the spy The spy earns 4 points if a non-spy player is successfully indicted of being a spy The spy earns 4 points if the spy stops the game and successfully guesses the location

Non-Spy Victory
Each non-spy player earns 1 point The player who initiated the successful indictment of the spy earns 2 points instead
